--- In nbwrpg@y..., hugar_twriker@y... wrote:
> OOC:  Hi hi, well I am back and have no idea what has happen while I 
> have been gone.  But my vacation was interesting.  My First week I 
> was up in Montreat with some church retreat thing with 17 other high 
> schoolers, and that was the best vacation of my Life. My second week 
> I went fly fishing in the Rockies.  I hate Fly fishing.  It was the 
> worst vacation of my life.  Well, I guess I should end this OOC 
> before Yanshosh starts yelling at me about it.  Well anyway, can 
> someone tell me what happen while I was chilling on the best vacation 
> of my life and the worst vacation of my life.
